name: Wacky Races
overview:
Wacky Races is an officially licensed racing game based on the popular cartoon series. It features 11 licensed vehicles, 23 licensed characters, and 6 tracks including Frosty Mountain, Urban City and Grand Canyon Desert.

The game uses a password system to save your individual game data rather than a card system, and up to 4 cabinets can be linked together for versus racing.
